Entries.Wedding_Jasper: sweet/-1000 -1000/farmer 26 63 1 Jasper 27 63 3 Aideen 30 66 0 Beatrice 30 65 0 CorwinLK 31 65 0 EdithHart 24 65 0 Eloise 25 66 0 EthanHart 25 65 0 Jacob 24 66 0 Jade 29 67 0 Jessie 25 70 0 Juliet 28 66 0 MichaelHart 23 65 0 Rosa 29 66 0 StellaHart 22 65 0 {{ESWeddingGuests}} Gunther 28 65 0 KatarynaLK 29 65 0 LumaJunimo -100 -100 2 Nova.Dylan? 28 68 0 Nova.Eli? 29 68 0 Nora? 31 67 0 Fievel? 31 68 0 RodneyOBrien? 30 68 0 MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Teren? 22 69 0 MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sigurd? 22 68 0 MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Gunnar? 24 68 0 MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Sondra 23 68 0 MadDog.HashtagBearFam.Gudrun 25 68 0 /changeToTemporaryMap EastScarp_Village_Wedding/viewport -1000 -1000/faceDirection Jade 0/showFrame Jasper 49/changeSprite Jessie Celebrant/viewport 26 64 true/advancedMove Jessie false 1 0 0 -6 4 100/globalFadeToClear/proceedPosition Jessie/pause 500/emote Jessie 40/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 2/showFrame Jasper 48/emote Jasper 32 true/pause 100/emote farmer 32 true/pause 600/faceDirection Jessie 2/pause 500/speak Jessie "Welcome, everyone. And thank you for joining us today, as we celebrate the union of two of our beloved villagers.$6"/pause 500/faceDirection Jessie 0/speak Jessie "@, who may not live in the Scarp, but whom, I think we can all agree, has been an honest and true friend....$6"/pause 500/emote Jessie 20 true/pause 500/emote Fievel? 32 true/emote SenS? 20 true/pause 500/emote ToriLK 32 true/pause 750/emote EdithHart 32 true/pause 500/speak Jessie "... and our dedicated scholar with a heart of gold, Jasper Thomas.$7"/pause 500/emote Jasper 60/pause 500/emote Jessie 20 true/pause 500/emote Gunther 32 true/pause 500/emote Aideen 32 true/pause 300/showFrame Jasper 49/pause 200/textAboveHead Jasper "Ready, my love?"/pause 500/faceDirection farmer 1/pause 1000/emote farmer 56/advancedMove Jessie false 0 1 4 100/proceedPosition Jessie/emote Jessie 40/speak Jessie "By the power vested in me, and by the strength of your love, I now pronounce you, married!$6#$b#You may kiss.$7"/pause 1000/faceDirection Jessie 2/pause 500/positionOffset Jasper -16 0/showFrame farmer 101/showFrame Jasper 50/specificTemporarySprite heart 21 106/pause 500/textAboveHead Juliet "Woohoo!"/pause 1500/playSound dwop/pause 2000/specificTemporarySprite wed/positionOffset Jasper 16 0/faceDirection farmer 2/showFrame Jasper 48/faceDirection MichaelHart 1 true/faceDirection EdithHart 3 true/faceDirection Jade 1/faceDirection ToriLK 3/advancedMove Jessie false 0 3 4 100/pause 4000/faceDirection farmer 1/showFrame Jasper 49/pause 500/warp LumaJunimo 30 58/temporarySprite 30 58 5 8 50 false 1/playSound coin/animate LumaJunimo true true 70 16 17 18 19/playSound junimoMeep1/pause 500/playSound junimoMeep1/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/pause 1000/message "[LocalizedText Strings\StringsFromCSFiles:Utility.cs.5381]"/pause 500/message "[LocalizedText Strings\StringsFromCSFiles:Utility.cs.5383]"/pause 4000/waitForOtherPlayers weddingEnd[FarmerUniqueId]/viewport move 0 -1 6000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end
